title: CashFlow Patrol
summary: Guard your finances simply, with ease
developerAddress:
Vojtěch Kozák
U Opavice 2248/4
Opava 746 01
Czech Republic
description: Would you like to save money? Can you tell how much you spend?Best way to achieve it is to track your incomes and expenses with CashFlow patrol.Even one month of expense tracking can give you some hints where to make cuts to save extra cash for your holiday trip, new bike, or … (fill gap yourself). CFPatrol current (and still growing) list of functions:1) 	Adding of new transactions, from app, widget or smart watch,2) 	Unlimited number of resources (cash, bank account, credit card, etc.),3) 	Automatic generation of repeatable transaction,4) 	Sorting of expenses and incomes by customizable categories and sub-categories,5) 	Budget for particular categories and sub-categories, with monthly, weekly and custom date range to stay alerted about your expense “quotas”,6) 	Support for foreign currency transactions,7) 	Draft transactions are saved to specific category and you can complete them later without losing of data,8) 	Attach your bill picture to every transaction,9) 	Comprehensive set ot filter for better orientation in your transaction listing,10)   Transaction statistics providing you with cash flow summary, charts covering structure of expenses/incomes and much more,11)   Adjustable data auto-backup ensuring that you shall never lose your data.
descriptionHTML:
Would you like to save money? Can you tell how much you spend?
Best way to achieve it is to track your incomes and expenses with CashFlow patrol.
Even one month of expense tracking can give you some hints where to make cuts to save extra cash for your holiday trip, new bike, or … (fill gap yourself).

CFPatrol current (and still growing) list of functions:
1) Adding of new transactions, from app, widget or smart watch,
2) Unlimited number of resources (cash, bank account, credit card, etc.),
3) Automatic generation of repeatable transaction,
4) Sorting of expenses and incomes by customizable categories and sub-categories,
5) Budget for particular categories and sub-categories, with monthly, weekly and custom date range to stay alerted about your expense “quotas”,
6) Support for foreign currency transactions,
7) Draft transactions are saved to specific category and you can complete them later without losing of data,
8) Attach your bill picture to every transaction,
9) Comprehensive set ot filter for better orientation in your transaction listing,
10) Transaction statistics providing you with cash flow summary, charts covering structure of expenses/incomes and much more,
11) Adjustable data auto-backup ensuring that you shall never lose your data.
comments: NEPROBÍHAJÍ AKTUALIZACE!! Začalo padat:-(  ---- Is it possible to backup data to external SD card? In internal memory it's useless in case of damaged phone. And what about upload backuos to google drive?

Unfortunately, after switching phones I was not able to import the database. The app keeps crashing. That was it: all my data is gone. I'm not going to invest more time, setting everything up again, just to lose more data later. Bye bye CFPatrol.

I use it for tracking the finances during vacations and it has everything I need. I especially like the widget to quickly add a new expense. the only thing I would love to have would be automatic location tracking.
All good but no use without everyother week option. Better would be to add multiplier for week or month etc.

very good easy and smooth interface. the best expense managing app ive used so far.    but please add  fortnightly repeatable transactions and transacrions trackable for both resources when transferring to another resource for your update.
Fortnightly? Lovely app however I can use it as there is no fortnightly option.
